original_text: And it shall come to pass in that day, that Tyre shall be forgotten seventy years, according to the days of one king: after the end of seventy years shall Tyre sing as an harlot.
korean_text: 그 날부터 두로가 한 왕의 연한 같이 칠십 년 동안 잊어버린 바 되었다가 칠십 년이 찬 후에 두로는 기생의 노래 같이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass in that day
that Tyre shall be forgotten seventy years
according to the days of one king
after the end of seventy years
shall Tyre sing as an harlot
